rules_text:
Home of Monsters enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {G}.
{2}{B}{G}{U}, {T}: Transform Home of Monsters.
rules_text2:
When this land transforms into Vorkezo, put five +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
flavor_text2: [i]Vorkezo calls out to the lonely and the lost, to those ready to become monsters.[/i]
